short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: QR Code Generator for Google Chrome

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Create custom QR codes quickly and easily with our Chrome extension. Perfect for any QR code needs, from marketing to personal use.

★ Key Features:

✓ Super Fast: Generate QR codes instantly.
✓ Customizable: Change QR code and background colors to suit your style.
✓ Error Correction: Supports all four error correction levels (L, M, Q, H) for reliable scanning.
✓ Easy to Use: User-friendly interface for all experience levels.
✓ Logo Insertion: Add a logo to your QR codes for branding purposes.
✓ Save Options: Save your QR codes as PNG or SVG files for versatile use.
✓ Auto-Save Settings: Automatically save your QR code settings, such as colors, for ease of use in the future.
✓ Dark and Light Themes: Seamlessly switch between dark and light modes for a more comfortable user experience.

★ If you enjoy using our extension, please give us a good rating and write a review. Your feedback helps us improve and provide the best experience possible.
